summary: Joseph "Joey" Lawrence  is an American actor and R&B singer.
full_text: Joseph Lawrence Mignogna Jr. , is an American actor, singer, and game show host. He is known for his roles as Joey Donovan in the TV series Gimme a Break!, Joey Russo in Blossom, Joe Roman  in Brotherly Love, and as Joe Longo in Melissa & Joey.
title: Joey Lawrence
